Loutre Blog <<<<<<< HEAD https://loutrotistic.github.io/ Recent content on Loutre Blog Hugo en-us Â© Loutre Mon, 17 Mar 2025 22:56:45 +0100 WRITEUP - Cap HackTheBox https://loutrotistic.github.io/posts/cap/ Mon, 17 Mar 2025 22:56:45 +0100 https://loutrotistic.github.io/posts/cap/

First, we use nmap to see the services running on this server:

~> nmap -sV 10.10.10.245 -p- --min-rate 5000
...
PORT   STATE SERVICE VERSION
21/tcp open  ftp     vsftpd 3.0.3
22/tcp open  ssh     OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.2 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0)
80/tcp open  http    Gunicorn
Service Info: OSs: Unix, Linux; CPE: cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel

We check for service version if there is some vuln exploitable to get a direct access to the server, but there is not. So we go check the website on port 80.

About https://loutrotistic.github.io/about/ Sat, 15 Mar 2025 17:15:17 +0100 https://loutrotistic.github.io/about/

Hello ! My name is Younes, also known as Loutre online.

I am a french engineering student and a cybersecurity enthousiast.
I started learning cybersecurity few months ago and I want to work in this domain. I am currently looking for an apprenticeship in cybersecurity to improve my knowledge and skills.

I am gonna post some writeups and new things I learn !

Here my accounts on RootMe, HackTheBox and TryHackMe.

Abstract Syntax Tree https://loutrotistic.github.io/posts/ast/ Fri, 14 Mar 2025 19:41:42 +0100 https://loutrotistic.github.io/posts/ast/

What is Abstract Syntax Tree ?

Here I will present to you the results of my research on AST, which helped me to solve the AST Deobfuscation challenge on RootMe.

Abstract Syntax Tree is a data structure to represent the structure of a program. It is a tree representation of the abstract syntax structure of text written in a formal language.

We call this structure “Abstract” because it does not show every details appearing in the original syntax.
